div.p: A type code describing the wound or skin injury. Differentiating pressure ulcers and other types of wounds is important for an accurate count of their number and for identifying appropriate wound treatment. The values will be used for documenting and retrieving data regarding the number and types of wounds present.

publisher.value: HL7 Patient Care and Clinical Information Modeling Initiative Work Groups
